root.name: Need for Speed: Rivals
root.description: Need for Speed Rivals is an upcoming open-world racing video game in development at Swedish games developer Ghost Games (formerly EA Gothenburg), the twentieth installment in the long-running Need for Speed series. The game is to be released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 3 and Xbox 360 on 19 November 2013 and will also be released for PlayStation 4 and Xbox One later in 2013.
